summary: This document is a set of prison system records from the Bureau of Prisons regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein, generated on April 29, 2020. It includes his housing history, clearance data, disciplinary record, security designation, custody classification, and profile, all showing his status as deceased on August 10, 2019, and listing his charges of sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of all prison system records, listed as deceased on August 10, 2019, with charges of sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors.

locations: NYM-NEW YORK MCC (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's official prison records confirm his death on August 10, 2019, at 07:36.
Epstein was incarcerated at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM-NEW YORK MCC) and was charged with 'SEX TRAFFICKING CONSP.' and 'SEX TRAFFICKING OF MINORS'.
The records show he was placed on a mental health care level (CARE1-MENTAL HEALTH) on July 8, 2019.
The documents indicate no disciplinary entries existed for Epstein in the chronological log for the time period requested.
Epstein's custody classification and designation records were noted as non-existent for this inmate in the system.
